description: This file contains React component definitions and utility functions used for UI elements in the frontend of a food delivery application. It includes functions for formatting currency, displaying toast notifications, and rendering a panel layout.

methods.name: money(amount)
methods.description: Formats a number or string as a currency string in USD.

methods.name: Toast({ message, onDone, durationMs = 2200 })
methods.description: A React component that displays a transient message notification.

methods.name: Panel({ title, subtitle, right, children })
methods.description: A React component that renders a styled section with optional header elements.

ctags.name: Panel
ctags.pattern: /^export function Panel({ title, subtitle, right, children }) {$/
